content: chain 1 single_crochet in next 8 9 sts 3 single_crochet in next row 3 turn chain 1 single_crochet in next 6 7 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 15 17 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in st single_crochet in next 9 11 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 16 17 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 15 17 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 9 10 sts apr 2017 more heart to heart patterns may be found on ravelry com by searching for heart to heart bear page 1 short sleeve crochet dress 75 81 single_crochet buttonhole loops on the top *1 half_double_crochet thru next buttonhole row and the next st of row this next row adds decorative trim to sleeve caps 12* repeat from * once half_double_crochet in each st to row 7 turn chain 1 single_crochet in next 10 11 sts **single_crochet ch2 the end of the round double_crochet in next st skip next st repeat 9 10 times 40 43 half_double_crochet for a total of 10 11 single_crochet ch2 double_crochet clusters single_crochet in note if you want to add a ribbon to tie the next 18 19 sts **single_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next st skip waist work this row in double_crochet instead of half_double_crochet next st repeat 9 10 times for a total of 10 11 single_crochet ch2 double_crochet clusters single_crochet in next 9 10 sts begin skirt work skirt until 3¾ 4 inches long adjusting this next row forms the armholes number of row as needed row 8 turn chain 1 single_crochet in next 9 10 scs chain 2 skip the next 10 11 single_crochet ch2 double_crochet clusters single_crochet in next lacy skirt 18 19 scs chain 2 skip the next 10 11 single_crochet ch1 abbreviations double_crochet cluters single_crochet in next 10 11 scs v st double_crochet chain double_crochet into same stitch 36 39 single_crochet and 4 chain shell 2dc chain 2dc into same stitch row 9 turn chain 1 single_crochet in each st and chain across 41 44 single_crochet round 1 turn chain 1 40 43 single_crochet join with slip_stitch to chain row 10 12 turn chain 1 single_crochet in each st across 1 41 44 single_crochet round 2 turn chain 4 counts as 1 double_crochet and 1 chain 1 double_crochet underarm length should be about 1 inch/2 in the same single_crochet **skip 1 shell in next single_crochet skip cm work two row2 more or less if needed 1 v st in next st repeat from ** to end of round join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain at beginning of the next 2 row are worked vertically to form the round buttonholes round 3 6 turn chain 4 counts as 1 double_crochet and 1 chain 1 double_crochet buttonhole row 1 chain 1 then going up the edge in the 1st v st **shell in shell v st in v st toward the neck work 2 single_crochet chain 2 skip 2 repeat
